General.Name: Better Life Commercial Chain Share Co Ltd
General.Description: Better Life Commercial Chain Share Co.,Ltd engages in retail merchandise business in China. It offers products and services through supermarkets, department stores, convenient store, appliance store, e-commerce, and other retail formats. The company also engages in financing, logistics, and transportation businesses. The company was formerly known as Better Life Commercial Chain Limited Liability Company. Better Life Commercial Chain Share Co.,Ltd was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Xiangtan, China.
